transcript:
[Ringing]
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Good morning sir, Vineet baat kar raha hoon.
Customer: Good morning bhai, main aayi thi.
Executive: Are sir main ye keh raha hoon ki mere ko na wo Nivesh ka call aaya tha wo keh rahe the ki aapke paas credit manager aayega aaj.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: To wo Nivesh aapko call karega ki kya kya usme matlab wo kya kya cheeze hoti hai kya kya hota hai usme verification mein ya kya kya bolna chahiye.
Executive: Wo keh raha tha ki usi ke basis pe hota hai ab mujhe to sir isme knowledge nahi hai ek baar aap unse baat kar lijiye wo aapko call karega Nivesh.
Customer: Main main baat kar lunga theek hai main baat kar lunga.
Executive: Bas theek hai sir iske upar to isliye bada bhag daud rahi hai bada aapne bhi kafi time diya hai is cheez ke liye to usko kar lete hain.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai sir theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai bhai ji theek hai.
Executive: Okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a call regarding credit manager visit.



Resolution:

- Executive informed customer about Nivesh's call regarding verification.

- Executive advised customer to speak with Nivesh for details.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Nivesh will call the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- credit manager, verification, nivesh call
